Employment Fair
It is a Kyiv Post biannual recruiting event that brings together leading companies and prospective employees. We have 12 years of experience as a career matchmaker
Learn more

Why participate?

Employment Fair is a Kyiv Post biannual recruiting event that brings together leading companies and prospective employees. We have 12 years of experience as a career matchmaker. Why participate?



HR Brand

Reinforce your company’s HR brand and present it as a great place to work at



Fast Hiring Process

Save time, money and human resources to directly connect with 2000 potential applicants



Recruiting experience

Learn recruiting experience of other market players and stay updated with current HR trends



Brand Exposure

Enjoy publicity offered by the event by advertising your company in the EF promotion materials

Flexible participation options

Kyiv Post Employment Fair offers four participation options which will fit your company’s needs and values:

  • Company booth
  • Seminar/workshop
  • Absentee participation
  • Exclusive opportunity: General Sponsor

Feedback

“We were happy to participate in the Employment Fair!
Everything was great. We met a lot of students and young specialists
and had job interviews with some of them.
Now we have candidates for junior positions.”


— Yulia Sytnik, Mazars Ukraine

“Participation in the event allowed the company to hire highly qualified specialists
in different fields. At the Employment Fair, companies have great opportunities
to present themselves as employers and find outstanding professionals
who have excellent communication skills, can work in a team,
and who are proficient in foreign languages.”


— Ivan Synyakov, NJSC Naftogaz of Ukraine

“The Kyiv Post Employment Fair is a useful and modern initiative
which helps gather highly professional candidates and future specialists in one place.
We are always glad to take part in such events with our PwC Academy master classes.”


— Irina Blinova, PwC
